name: Rafting
description:
Rafting game made for Weekly Game Jam #143: "Running Water"

Controls: click/tap and drag left & right to control the raft (ok, it looks like a boat now, but pretend it's a raft 😉)

Credits
  • Art by Kenney and 2d Game Art Bundle
  • Music: "sidebyside" by panu
  • Fonts: Cookie & Roboto
